--questions--
I get the same accuracies for all of them and they all end up positive...I don't know why and I asked people why and they 
don't know...as a result all of them perform the same. I know this is a shitty answer but I put in so much time on this 
assignment and I'm bamboozled on how to improve my accuracy so please forgive me.
I have tried one way of improving it and that is to take things from most informative features and it would give me 68%
in better results but all the words would be negative. I'm not using that as that is a hacky way of doing things as I hard
code it into feature_vectors and do nothing else.
